narrative:
No noncompliant items documented on this 1st Prelicense Inspection for a Class C license. 
The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant. 
The licensing fee must be mailed to: 
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care 
2150 Centre Ave. 
Building B, 3W11 
Fort Collins, CO 80526 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
End Section

species.scientific: Canis lupus X C. l. familiaris
